actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974 to clarify whistleblower rights and protections, and for other purposes.
short_title: Department of Energy and Nuclear Regulatory Commission Whistleblower Protection Act of 2019
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text:
Department of Energy and Nuclear Regulatory Commission Whistleblower Protection Act of 2019

This bill provides statutory authority for employees of the Nuclear Regulatory Commission and the Department of Energy to have whistle-blower rights and protections.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974 to clarify whistleblower rights and protections, and for other purposes.
